metadata.description: Mink has fallen for the dreamy idol, Dick Saucer, but there's a problem: Dick's not just an idol -- he's a dragon slayer, too... and Mink is half dragon! Now Mink and her friends must set out on a quest to destroy the Demon Lord Azetodeth and gain a potion that will make Mink human! Will Mink find true love or is this doomed to be a fetch quest failure?
metadata.name: Dragon Half
